entry.tran: 详尽无遗的;彻底全面的
entry.def: If you describe a study, search, or list as exhaustive, you mean that it is very thorough and complete.

example.ex: This is by no means an exhaustive list but it gives an indication of the many projects taking place...
example.tran: 这绝称不上是详尽无遗的清单，但是列出了很多正在进行的项目。

example.ex: The author's treatment of the subject is exhaustive.
example.tran: 该作者对这个问题的分析很透彻。
